text: Halloween is coming soon. At this point, the day itself is not something I really care about, it's the whole month of October that I find exciting. I always wait to play horror games and watch horror movies until that month to get in the mood, and since I've been doing that I've appreciated the genre even more. I've been watching The Haunting of Hill House and it's been great so far. I also played an indie game on Steam called Colina Legacy, which seemed inspired by Silent Hill, but I dropped it after a couple hours.
author: SupraDarky

text:
I'll admit as someone who has been following your channel for a while, I was a little surprised you hadn't uploaded this song yet. Then again, this is the fourth song from Banjo-Kazooie on your channel. Nothing wrong with that, but I just found it peculiar :P

Grant Kirkhope crafted such a solid soundtrack for this game. This may not be my favorite song in the game, but it matches the Halloween theme incredibly well!

text: I just love how unique Banjo Kazooie music is and how many defining characteristics it has across all of the tracks. If you hear a song, you can immediately recognize it's from this series even if you've never heard it before. The variety of sounds they include are impressive and they weren't afraid to go outside of the box at all.
